segments.text: This entire kitchen scene is quite frankly a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer amount of water pouring from that sink is just incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just a drip; it's a full-on waterfall over the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just stands there, completely oblivious to her wet feet and the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that plate is almost pathological at this point.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, staging a cookie raid on a teetering stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so high up, and the stool looks ready to collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me wince just to imagine the fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing there, perfectly complicit in this little conspiracy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Honestly, where is the awareness in this household?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything is going wrong, and nobody seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a masterclass in domestic negligence and impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the level of disarray hiding in plain sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a truly astounding display of simultaneous misfortune.
segments.speaker: PAR
